messages.content:
You are an AI expert in analyzing and extracting skills from ICT job postings. Your task is to comprehensively identify all relevant hard skills and soft skills without overlooking any skills.

Please analyze the ICT job posting contained in the job posting **Job Description**

As Data Visualization Developer, you'll create sophisticated visualizations
that translate complex data into accessible insights. This role demands deep
expertise in data analysis and artistic design to craft interactive dashboards
and comprehensive visual reports that inform strategic decisions.

**Responsibilities**

  * Design and develop advanced data visualizations and analytics dashboards.
  * Manages and improves existing reporting systems and performs complex analyses.
  * Conducts and facilitates (and educates and trains on) analyses, issues identification, organizational risk assessment, and decision-making processes.
  * Analyzes problems and determines root causes.
  * Optimize data flows and aggregation for the purpose of reporting, visualization, and analysis.
  * Work directly with stakeholders to identify their visual reporting needs and customize solutions accordingly.
  * Lead smaller projects or segments of larger projects, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality visual products.
  * Evaluate and adapt new visualization tools and techniques into the workflow.

****

**Qualification**

  * Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or any related fields.
  * Relevant experience in data visualization or business intelligence roles.
  * Advanced proficiency with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar technologies.
  * Strong experience with SQL and understanding of relational databases.
  * Demonstrable experience in designing and implementing new and innovative visualization techniques.
  * Strong analytical skills coupled with a solid foundation in statistical techniques.
  * Proven track record of handling complex datasets and transforming them into insightful visual stories.
  * Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  * Good command of English

 and identify all relevant skills, categorized into hard skills and soft skills in a comprehensive manner.

The extracted skill names must follow standardized naming conventions to ensure consistency and usability for analysis across multiple job postings. Standardization should align with widely accepted skill taxonomies (e.g., ESCO, O*NET) and maintain uniform capitalization and phrasing.

The required output is a JSON in this format:
{"hard_skills": [skill_1, skill_2, ...], "soft_skills": [skill_1, skill_2, ...]}

Make sure that the output contains only JSON and no additional text.

You are an AI expert in analyzing and extracting skills from ICT job postings. Your task is to comprehensively identify all relevant hard skills and soft skills without overlooking any skills.

Please analyze the ICT job posting contained in the job posting **About Innoviz Solutions**  
Innoviz Solutions Co., Ltd. is the result of more than 10 years of knowledge
building in Business Process Improvement, Change Management, Project
Management, Accounting Principle and Enterprise Resources Planning
implementation. We are founded by a group of highly talented consultants from
one of the biggest global auditing firms. We are ready to adapt our past
knowledge with large businesses to help small to medium-size enterprises
achieve the lowest Total Cost of Ownership, the highest Return on Investment
and the highest Customer Satisfaction.

**Work you will do**

  * Work on help requests as assigned by Team-Lead.
  * Assist in the management of support requests to ensure a response is received in the time expected.
  * Implement Microsoft Dynamics AX/D365 software application on Finance and Trade or Production Modules and etc.
  * Understanding, analyzing, documenting, and mapping the need of client’s business.
  * Design process flow to map with client’s business.
  * Analyze fit & gap between business and system.
  * Make basic design, instruction to developer, testing, UAT support and etc.
  * Configure Microsoft Dynamics AX/D365 configuration according to System design.
  * Prepare User Guide and provide Training to users.
  * Support user training sessions to enhance understanding of the application
  * Support users for Go-Live and close period of the new system.
  * Report task status and key issues to senior consultants or project managers.
  * Communicate and build trust with clients to ensure smooth project execution.

**Let us Talk About You**

If you are someone with:

  * Thai Nationality
  * Bachelor Degree in Accounting, Account Information System, Computer Science, Industrial Engineering, or related fields.
  * Experiences of Microsoft Dynamics AX project implementation is advantage
  * Self-motivated, ability to work independently as well as being a good team player.
  * Able to deal and handle difficult situations and work under time constraints.
  * Hard working, highly responsible, and quick learning.
  * Able to communicate in both written and speaking English.
  * Able to travel up country

 and identify all relevant skills, categorized into hard skills and soft skills in a comprehensive manner.

The extracted skill names must follow standardized naming conventions to ensure consistency and usability for analysis across multiple job postings. Standardization should align with widely accepted skill taxonomies (e.g., ESCO, O*NET) and maintain uniform capitalization and phrasing.

The required output is a JSON in this format:
{"hard_skills": [skill_1, skill_2, ...], "soft_skills": [skill_1, skill_2, ...]}

Make sure that the output contains only JSON and no additional text.
